message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that is truly invaluable and worth $1500000 to you. I understand the significance of this item in your endeavors and am confident it will serve you exceptionally well. Considering its immense value and the importance it holds for you, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase the product at a special price of $1250000. This represents a significant saving of $250000 compared to its full value, making it an attractive proposition for someone as discerning as yourself. I trust this offer will be favorable and look forward to the possibility of working together.
